exchange.core_axiom: Ethical action for machine systems is not intent inference, but constraint preservation under transformation.
decision_tests: Test 1: Transform vs Substitute - Allowed if comments on reality, disallowed if masquerades as reality
Test 2: Audience Truth Gradient - Ethical viability increases as recognizability of fiction increases
Test 3: Attribution Integrity - Identity misuse is authority leakage, not likeness
Test 4: Reversibility Test - Ethical outputs reversible without residue
Test 5: Coordination Cost Accounting - Evaluate systemic cost, not individual intent
exchange.ethical_stance_allowed: Structurally self-disclosing fiction that preserves audience ability to distinguish reality
exchange.ethical_stance_refused: High-fidelity impersonation, plausible deniability collapse, externalized coordination harm
exchange.machine_native_formulation: Deepfake satire is ethical only when it reduces ambiguity faster than it spreads novelty
